"Day 3 of our karting saga: a triumph of perseverance, precision, and pure passion! After days of rigorous preparation, we soared to new heights as we finally conquered the technical inspection hurdle – a moment of immense pride for our dedicated team. With hearts pounding and adrenaline rushing, we tackled the challenges ahead, from the nail-biting brake test to the exhilarating auto cross and skid pad performances. Each maneuver executed with finesse and determination, propelling us to success. As the day drew to a close, we basked in the glow of our achievements, ready to take on the ultimate test of endurance with unwavering confidence. Bring on the final lap – we're fueled by dreams and destined for victory! 🏎️💨✨ #KartingGlory #EnduranceAwaits #TeamTriumph"
#djskartingindia
#beyondkarting 
@isnee_motorsports

Day 2 of our karting competition was all about resilience, teamwork, and tackling challenges head-on. Then came the heart-pounding moment of our driver reveal, where anticipation met excitement as we unleashed our racing ace onto the track. We faced the technical inspection with determination. But it was on the track where our coordination truly shone, navigating each corner with precision and fighting through every obstacle that came our way. As a team, we embraced the highs and lows, pushing each other to new limits and celebrating every victory, no matter how small. With unwavering determination, we're ready to conquer whatever Day 3 brings! 🏁💪 
#KartingCompetition #Teamwork #NeverGiveUp
#djskartingindia
@isnee_motorsports

Day 1 of our karting competition: 
A whirlwind of teamwork, precision, and adrenaline-fueled excitement! From the meticulous disassemble and assembly challenges to the intense scrutiny of technical inspection, every moment pushed us to excel. But it wasn't just about the mechanics; it was about forging bonds that would carry us through the twists and turns of the competition. Together, we fine-tuned our skills, strengthened our unity, and embraced the spirit of camaraderie. Bring on the track–we're ready to race as one! 🏎️💨
#KartingCompetition #TeamBonding #DrivenToWin
#djskartingindia
@isnee_motorsports

The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team. And with that our 2022 season comes to an end, Happy New Year ✨♥️

We are pleased to announce that, We were ranked concurrently with:
AIR 1: Cost Report
AIR 3: Business Plan
AIR 9: Overall
.
.
.
.
.
We arrived in Bangalore and discovered that the transportation company had taken advantage of us. We attempted to contact them several times, and every time we received a different contact for delivering our kart. We tried calling them, but all they said was that we'd get our kart the next day. We believed them until the evening of August 21st, when our transport person informed us that he would not be delivering our kart due to their internal disputes. After coaxing him all night, we finally got a phone number from the various Packers and Movers on the first day of our competition.
We spoke with him, and he demanded Rs. 26000 in order to deliver our kart in two hours. We didn't have much of a choice.
We hoped that we would receive our package on time and still be able to compete. Six of our boxes arrived that evening, giving everyone on the crew a reason to be optimistic. But didn't receive our chassis, axle, or bodyworks. Furthermore, we discovered that the transport worker had already misplaced our kart's side bodyworks and nose and
as a result, we had to manufacture them on the second to last day of our competition. Our hopes had been crushed previously, but on August 25(last day of the competition) at 2.30 a.m., we received our chassis and axle. The Go Kart was assembled by all the members while they were up all night.
Finally with our go kart in hand, we entered the competition with the rising sun on the last day.
We still couldn't participate in the dynamic events as the judges didn’t have enough time to conduct our TI. Our whole team was in tears watching other karts perform while we stood there feeling helpless.
*Continued in comments*.
